This visa has replaced the Tier 2 (General) work visa. It also allows you to work in UK waters. Eligibility Your job To qualify for a Skilled Worker visa, you must: work for a UK employer that’s been approved by the Home Office have a ‘certificate of sponsorship’ (CoS) from your employer with information about the role you’ve been offered in the UK do a job that’s on the list of eligible occupations be paid a minimum salary - how much depends on the type of work you do and the date you got your CoS The specific eligibility depends on your job (/skilled-worker-visa/your-job).
